name: zig-cats
description: A category theory and functional programing library for Zig language

releases.name: A minor release for update README.md and build.zig.zon
releases.body: Fixes bug #1, and update version number in build.zig.zon.

releases.name: Add SemiGroup, Monoid, Free Monad, State, add some utility types.
releases.body:
This release is an important release version. Add more type classes such as SemiGroup, Monoid, add more type class instance, such as Free Monad, State, Numb, AllBool, AnyBool, SumNumb, ProductNumb. add CI workflow for zig-cats.
Update the README.md file for introduce zig-cats.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/flyfish30/zig-cats/compare/v0.1.1...v0.4.0

releases.name: Add complete unit test for Functor|Applicative|Monad and Compose|Product|Coproduct
Add support Functor/Applicative/Monad and some samples.
